attributes.description:
MKR AUTO SALES
2003 Opel Astra 1.6 for sale!!!
Visit us at 495 Cape Road, Westering, Port Elizabeth & Plot 2704 Dyke Road, Algoa Park Port Elizabeth, and speak to us for the friendliest service and the best deals in town!
Features:
Manual Windows (back and front)
Central Locking (incl. auto windows)
Leather Interior
Mag wheels
190181kms
Stunning Vehicle!
Own a GSI now for just R79900.00!!!
Trade-ins welcomed
Financing is available with all major banks to creditworthy clients only
1 or 2 Year Warranty Options Available
Price excludes on-road charges
Vehicles transported countrywide at an additional cost
Vehicles Wanted For Cash Daily
Cars, Bakkies, SUVs, Panel Vans, D/Cabs and Kombis
Change Of Ownership Done Immediately
We Buy and Sell Vehicles 365 Days A Year In And Around P.E Area
Vehicles bought with immediate EFT payment
Wide variety of cars to choose from
Spotters fees paid on successful referrals
#mkrautosales
